Definition: In this task, you're given a text and a title. The title is present in the text and refers to an entity in the document. If the title is correct, indicate your answer as "Yes". Otherwise, indicate your answer as "No".

Positive Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Positive Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, it is the title of the document.

Positive Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Positive Examples.explanation: "HMS Argyll" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Here, the text in parentheses "F31" is not present in the document and it can be ignored. Hence, the output is correct.

Negative Examples.input:
Text: The Mansfield Building Society is a UK building society which has its headquarters in Mansfield Nottinghamshire. It is a member of the Building Societies Association. 
Title: Mansfield Building Society
Negative Examples.explanation: The title "Mansfield Building Society" is present in the text and it is the main entity that is referred in the text. Hence, the output is incorrect.

Negative Examples.input:
Text:  The third and current HMS Argyll is a Type 23 'Duke' Class frigate. She is currently the oldest serving Type 23 frigate in the Royal Navy. Like all of her class she is named for a British dukedom in this case that of Argyll. 
Title: HMS Argyll (F231)
Negative Examples.explanation: The output should be either "Yes" or "No". Hence, it is negative example.

Instances.input:
Text:  The Timbozinho River is a river of Santa Catarina state in southeastern Brazil. It is part of the Paraná River basin and a tributary of the Timbó River. 
Title: Timbozinho River

Text:  John McGregor Johnny McIntyre (4 January 1895 – 1974) was a Scottish professional footballer born in Glasgow who played in the Football League in England for Fulham Sheffield Wednesday Blackburn Rovers and Blackpool. 
Title: Sancta Maria Mater et Regina Seminarium

Text:  Robert D. Bob Royer (October 15 1927 – May 30 1973) was an American professional basketball player. Royer was selected in the eighth round in the 1949 BAA Draft by the Providence Steamrollers. He played for the Denver Nuggets in 1949–50 before ending his NBA career after one season.Royer attended Bowling Green High School in Bowling Green Ind. 
Title: Bob Royer

Text:  Precious Gems was Tom Fogerty's sixth album credited as Tom Fogerty + Ruby . 
Title: USS Quick (DD-490)

Text:  Mullin High School or Mullin School is a 1A high school located in Mullin Texas (USA). It is part of the Mullin Independent School District located in northwest Mills County. Mullin School has all grades (K-12) in one building. In 2013 the school was rated Met Standard by the Texas Education Agency. 
Title: Mullin High School

Text:  Daniel Lipšic (born 8 July 1973) is a Slovak politician and Jurist. He is a former Deputy Prime Minister Minister of Justice and former Minister of Interior. Until 28 May 2012 he was a member of the Christian Democratic Movement (KDH) in which he served as Vice-President and a Member of Parliament. Through his legal and political career he is noted for his hard-line stance regarding officials from the former communist Czechoslovak regime as well as crimes committed during this period. 
Title: ACS Nano

Text:  Talk to Me is the fifth solo album by Joey McIntyre a member of New Kids on the Block. These are smooth contemporary renditions of classic songs previously recorded by Frank Sinatra and other great singers. From December 19 2006 to February 11 2007 McIntyre went on the 38 city smash hit tour Dancing with the Stars - The Tour performing Come Dance With Me with dancers and The Way You Look Tonight with the band. During the eight weeks tour the album sold 10000 copies. 
Title: Talk to Me (album)

Text:  Elias Hazrati (b. 13 March 1961 Rasht) is an Iranian politician journalist and former martial of Armed Forces of Iran. After retiring from the military he served as a member of the Parliament of Iran from 1989 until 2004. He is currently editor-in-chief of the daily newspaper Etemaad. 
Title: Shepherdia
